name: Distract My Toddler
description:
As a father of twins, I know the struggles of keeping a toddler happy and entertained, if only for a minute. I developed these simple games for my children, and am now releasing them free to the world. May they help you in your time of need.

The games:
Farm Train - A train with 10 animals goes by and makes noise.
Alpha-Bubble - Pop the bubble with a letter in it.
Bug Splat - Colorful bugs move on the screen and counts to 20 as you splat them.
Toddler Food - Touch on the food and it gets eaten with some funny sounds.
